user.title: Configure Free Sleep
user.description: Enter the URL of your Free Sleep device, including the protocol and port (e.g., http://10.0.0.5:3000).

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Free Sleep
reconfigure.description: Enter the URL of your Free Sleep device, including the protocol and port (e.g., http://10.0.0.5:3000).

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the Free Sleep device. Please check the URL and ensure the device is reachable.
error.invalid_url: The host URL must start with `http://` or `https://`.

set_schedule.name: Set schedule
set_schedule.description: Sets the temperature schedule for the Free Sleep device, for the specified days and times.

day_of_week.name: Day of Week
day_of_week.description: The day of the week to set the schedule for. If not specified, the schedule will be set for all days.

schedule.name: Schedule
schedule.description: The temperature schedule to set, as object containing a `temperatures`, `power`, and/or `alarm` property. Note that temperatures are expected to be in the unit used in your Home Assistant instance. Refer to the Free Sleep API documentation (https://github.com/throwaway31265/free-sleep/blob/main/server/API.md#apischedules) for more details.

side.name: Side
side.description: The side(s) of the bed to set the schedule for.
